scripts.build: npm run build:protocol && npm run build:db && npm run build:fgmpackd && npm run build:extension
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch -w fgmpack
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run vsce:package -w fgmpack
scripts.install:server: npm run build:fgmpackd && mkdir -p ~/.local/bin && cp dist/language-server/server.js ~/.local/bin/fgmpackd && chmod +x ~/.local/bin/fgmpackd && echo 'Installed to ~/.local/bin/fgmpackd' && (echo $PATH | grep -q '.local/bin' && echo 'Ready to use: fgmpackd' || echo 'Add ~/.local/bin to PATH: export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"')
